PreceptDef.label: increased
PreceptDef.description: The minds of children are fertile ground, ready to be shaped and cultivated.

PreceptDef.label: normal
PreceptDef.description: Children should learn and grow at their own pace, guided by natural curiosity and the wisdom of their elders.

PreceptDef.label: decreased
PreceptDef.description: Childhood should be a time of simplicity and play. Overburdening young minds with excessive learning only leads to stress and a loss of innocence.
